item.title: Massive fire erupts at nursing home in Pennsylvania
item.description: A massive fire has erupted at a nursing home in eastern Pennsylvania following a possible gas explosion, officials said.

item.title: Trump says it would be 'smart' for Venezuela's Maduro to step down
item.description: President Trump continues to ramp up pressure on Venezuela's Nicholas Maduro, saying it would be "smart" for him to step down and warning him not to p...

item.title: WATCH: Alabama football player brings Christmas joy to local children
item.description: Crimson Tide center Parker Brailsford used money from his (NIL) name, image and likeness deal to give 10 kids a brighter Christmas.

item.title: WATCH: Mom thwarts burglars by ramming them with her car
item.description: A California mom was caught on video driving her car into the vehicle of burglars attempting to escape a home they robbed.

item.title: Latest Epstein release details investigation into possible co-conspirators
item.description: The Justice Department on Monday released additional documents from its files on the convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
